Constructor Detail

ScoreKeeper

public ScoreKeeper()
Creates an Array that holds the score for each square. Square 0 is null. The default value is set at -2 as a BlankSquare.

Method Detail

checkForWinner

public boolean checkForWinner()
Checks if their is winner by adding the value of the winning combinations of squares to see if the value is 3 for player 1 or 6 for player 2. Returns true if there is a winner.

Returns:
true if there is a winner, false if not

getScore

public int getScore(int x)
Gets the score for a selected square.

Parameters:
x - the square the score needs to be checked
Returns:
the score for the square in question

setScore

public void setScore(int x,
                     int y)
Sets the score for a square.

Parameters:
x - the square in question
y - the score of the corresponding player's score or the BlankScore
